A wooden pan flute.  It consists of a series of tubes of different lengths, arranged in parallel and bound together.  It is named after the Greek god Pan, who was often depicted playing this instrument.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your wooden pan flute.
You play a beautiful piece on your wooden pan flute.
You play a piece on your wooden pan flute that sounds harmonious with nature.

description: A commercial stainless steel pan flute.  It consists of a series of tubes of different lengths, arranged in parallel and bound together.  It is named after the Greek god Pan, who was often depicted playing this instrument.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your steel pan flute.
You play a beautiful piece on your steel pan flute.
You play a piece on your steel pan flute that sounds harmonious with nature.

description: A commercial-grade, plastic toy pan flute meant to be played by children, but you can play it too.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your toy pan flute.
You play a beautiful, but somewhat goofy piece on your toy pan flute.
You play a calm, soothing piece on your toy pan flute.

description: A handmade bamboo Zampona pan flute.  It originated in the Andean region of South America, being a traditional Inca musical instrument.  It consists of a series of bamboo tubes of different lengths, arranged in parallel and bound together, with some characteristics, colorful props around it.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your Zampona.
You play a beautiful piece on your Zampona.
You play a piece on your Zampona that sounds harmonious with nature.

description: This is a Nai, a traditional Romanian pan flute.  It consists of a series of reed tubes of different lengths, arranged in parallel and bound together.  It features a beautiful red stain.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your Nai.
You play a beautiful piece on your Nai.
You play a piece on your Nai that sounds harmonious with your surroudindings.

description: A simple shinobue, a flute used traditionally in Japanese folk music.  It has 7 holes and requires some training to be played properly.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your Shinobue.
You play a beautiful piece on your Shinobue.
You play a piece on your Shinobue that sounds harmonious with your surroudindings.

description: A simple Korean piri, a double-reed flute made of bamboo, used traditionally in Korean folk music.  It has eight holes and requires some training to be played properly.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your Piri.
You play a beautiful piece on your Piri.
You play a piece on your Piri that sounds harmonious with your surroudindings.

description: A simple Norwegian flute called a seljefloyte, with a long history and an important part of Norwegian cultural heritage.  It has six finger holes on the top and two thumb holes on the side and requires some training to be played properly.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your Piri.
You play a beautiful piece on your Piri.
You play a piece on your Piri that sounds harmonious with your surroudindings.

description: This is a Wabakaki flute, an end-blown flute made from wood and crafted by hand using traditional techniques.  This is Native American musical instrument that originates from the Wabanaki Confederacy, a group of native tribes located in the northeastern United States and eastern Canada.  This simple object is full of culture and history.  You may call it 'm’teoulin' (Penobscot), 'skicin' (Passamaquoddy), 'wolastoqiyik wicihtasiwikewaq' (Maliseet), 'alasutmaqn' (Mi’kmaq) or 'wliwni niwaskw' (Abenaki).

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your Wabanaki flute.
You play a beautiful piece on your Wabanaki flute.
You play a piece on your Wabanaki flute that sounds harmonious with your surroudindings.

description: This is a traditional cedar wood Haudenosaunee flute, an end-blown flute made from wood and crafted by hand using traditional techniques, traditionally used by the six native tribes from the Iroquois Confederacy.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your Iroquois flute.
You play a beautiful piece on your Iroquois flute.
You play a piece on your Iroquois flute that sounds harmonious with your surroudindings.

description: This is a kalimba.  It is a musical instrument that originated in Africa, also known as a thumb piano.  It consists of a set of metal tines attached to a wooden resonator, which are played by plucking the keys with the thumbs.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your kalimba.
You play a beautiful piece on your kalimba.
You play a piece on your kalimba that sounds harmonious with nature.

description: A traditional Chinese stringed instrument, also called 'moon guitar'.  It is a long, flat, and rectangular instrument with strings made of silk, stretched over a wooden soundboard.  The yueqin has a distinctive and delicate sound, often used in traditional Chinese music and Chinese folk songs.

player_descriptions: You play a little tune on your yueqin.
You play a beautiful song on your yueqin.
